Articles.Content:
turn on the speakers

how do we fly

We strap ourselves to a large bird.

How do we sit on a chair?

We don't move away from it.

How can I find out which word is missing in sentence?

by looking for the the

how can i sing well?

Take lessons.

How would I harness the power of my Thu'um?

Very carefully

How do I get my parents to stop asking what I'm doing when I'm chatting online?

By making it blatantly obvious what you're doing.

How would I Put Ragebot in IRC?

Ask someone who knows programming.

How do I explain IRC chatting with people I met online to my 60+ year old parents without it sounding like I'm talking to creepy people?

How do I simply walk into mordor.

Edited June 17, 2013 by Rage097

lawl...

How do I get a legit question to answer in a sarcastic manner?

By looking at my edit

How do I improve my memory?

What memory?

How do I get my hair to do what I want, when I want?

Burn it and when new hair grows show it the burned remains to invoke fear so they will do what you say.

How do I take over any nation on this planet?

By heading to Antarctica

How do I Dance?

You get drunk and let the music move you... (Do not try this unless you are old enough to drink.)

How do I rebel?

By joining NOOYC

How do I explain that while sounding sane?

Very carefully. As I have no idea what it is...

How does one get away with murder?

By listening to Papa Roach.

How does one music?

With the daffodils and piano keys.

How do I talk to people without sounding like a moron?

Use the internet.

How would I walk into walmart and slap the manager?

Walk into walmart and slap the manager

How do I not die?

Throw yourself at the ground and miss.

How do I become one of those people who have a pop-culture referance for everything?

By Learning from your master, the internet.

How do I car?

Don't ask me, I don't drive either...

How do I find a safe way to update everyone about the PfL situation? For the ending of confusion, not to raise havoc, I promise.

By using the designated forum and getting one to tell everyone to look at it.

How do I DJ?
